Nothing.title: Nothing
Nothing.description: Parent type for all falsy values.

NeedComputing.title: NeedComputing
NeedComputing.description: State of the Box in case it need some computing.

Pending.title: Pending
Pending.description: State of the Box when it awaits input.

Stop.title: Stop
Stop.description: Value used to stop iterationin .each() and similar functions.

Something.title: Something
Something.description: Parent type for all non falsy values.

Obj.title: Obj
Obj.description: Parent type for all composite types.

Single.title: Single
Single.description: Parent type for all single value types.

Pointer.title: Pointer
Pointer.description: Holds key of an object or array.

functions.source:
v => v
    ? v._isAnything
      ? v.isNothing() ? false : !!v()
      : true
    : false
functions.title: Check isTruly ( v )
